definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
storage container for liquid or gas/gas holder

sentences.english: All highly flammable bulk storage containers will be kept in the oil storage room.
sentences.chinese: 所有高可燃性散装贮存容器将被保存在石油储存室。

sentences.english: Samples which cannot be stored easily shall be kept for a period determined in accordance with the circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 不易贮存的留样，可根据实际情况掌握保存时间。

sentences.english: Storage for ten months in shady room and dry place.
sentences.chinese: 贮于室内阴凉处，贮存期十个月。

sentences.english: Orders are taken by mail, and the goods are sent out from a central point where they are stored.
sentences.chinese: 定货单是邮寄来的，货物是从贮存中心发出去的。

sentences.english: I have my coffer and my store at each of your houses.
sentences.chinese: 在你们每位的家中都有我的财源和贮存的物品。

sentences.english: The runner kept some energy in store for spurting at the end.
sentences.chinese: 那名赛跑的人为最后的冲刺贮存精力。

sentences.english: As the nuclear calcium storage pool, the nuclear envelope is the original site that generating nuclear calcium signals.
sentences.chinese: 作为核钙的贮存库，核被是核钙信号的发源地。

sentences.english: Feed passes through the esophagus and into a temporary storage organ, the crop.
sentences.chinese: 食料经食道进入一个暂时的贮存器官，即嗉囊。

sentences.english: For those difficult to preserve, the preservation period shall depend on the actual circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 不易贮存的留样，可根据实际情况掌握保存时间。

sentences.english: The old man kept a large reserve of firewood for cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 这位老人贮存了大量的柴薪以备天冷时用。

sentences.english: Mother puts up a keeping [store] of preserved fruits and jellies every year.
sentences.chinese: 母亲每年都要贮存蜜饯和果冻。

sentences.english: They had sawn up the fallen tree, so they had a good store of firewood.
sentences.chinese: 他们把那棵倒下的树锯断了，因此贮存了丰富的柴火。

sentences.english: This article also make a primary discussion on best storage condition of straw biologic fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 还对秸秆生物肥的最佳贮存条件进行了初步探讨。

sentences.english: The speed and storage capacity of a computer is increasing every day.
sentences.chinese: 电脑的速度和贮存量与日俱增。

sentences.english: Our stock of matches is used up.
sentences.chinese: 我们贮存的火柴使完了。

sentences.english: These are the conditions under which the expiration date shall apply.
sentences.chinese: 在有效期内，药品应在规定的各条件下贮存。

definition: to deposit/to store/to leave in sb's care
(milk) to turn sour/(meat, fish) to go off
